text.section: The Commission consists of 21 members appointed by the Governor with the advice and consent of the Senate.

section.section: The term of a member is 4 years.
The terms of the members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Commission on October 1, 2005, and October 1, 2011.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member may be reappointed.
A member who has served two consecutive four-year terms may not be reappointed until at least one year has elapsed after the end of the previous term.

text.section: The Governor may remove a member for incompetence or misconduct.
